verses.verse: <S%G3956>Whoever<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4100>believes<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> is the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G1080>born<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> one that <S%G25>loves<s%> him that <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G25>loves<s%> him <S%G2532>also<s%> that is <S%G1080>begotten<s%> of him.

By <S%G5129>this<s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> that we <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> we <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G5083>keep<s%> his <S%G1785>commandments.<s%>
For <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> that we <S%G5083>keep<s%> his <S%G1785>commandments:<s%> and his <S%G1785>commandments<s%> are not <S%G926>grievous.<s%>

For <S%G3956>whatever<s%> is <S%G1080>born<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3528>overcomes<s%> the <S%G2889>world:<s%> and <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G3529>victory<s%> that <S%G3528>overcomes<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> even our <S%G4102>faith.<s%>
<S%G5101>Who<s%> is he that <S%G3528>overcomes<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> but he that <S%G4100>believes<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> is the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God?<s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> is he that <S%G2064>came<s%> by <S%G5204>water<s%> and <S%G129>blood,<s%> even <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> not by <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> but by <S%G5204>water<s%> and <S%G129>blood.<s%> And it is the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> that <S%G3140>bears<s%> <S%G3140>witness,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> is <S%G225>truth.<s%>

For there are <S%G5140>three<s%> that <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>record<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> the <S%G3056>Word,<s%> and the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost:<s%> and <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> are <S%G1520>one.<s%>

And there are <S%G5140>three<s%> that <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> in <S%G1093>earth,<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> and the <S%G5204>water,<s%> and the <S%G129>blood:<s%> and <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G1526>agree<s%> in <S%G1520>one.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> we <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G3141>witness<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> the <S%G3141>witness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3187>greater:<s%> for <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G3141>witness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he has <S%G3140>testified<s%> of his <S%G5207>Son.<s%>

He that <S%G4100>believes<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G3141>witness<s%> in <S%G1438>himself:<s%> he that <S%G4100>believes<s%> not <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G4160>made<s%> him a <S%G5583>liar;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G4100>believes<s%> not the <S%G3141>record<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3140>gave<s%> of his <S%G5207>Son.<s%>

And <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G3141>record,<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> to us <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> and <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> is in his <S%G5207>Son.<s%>
He that <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G2222>life;<s%> and he that <S%G2192>has<s%> not the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> not <S%G2222>life.<s%>

<S%G5023>These<s%> things have I <S%G1125>written<s%> to you that <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> that you may <S%G1492>know<s%> that you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> and that you may <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G3954>confidence<s%> that we <S%G2192>have<s%> in him, that, <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> thing <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G2307>will,<s%> he <S%G191>hears<s%> us:

And <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> that he <S%G191>hear<s%> us, <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G302><s%> we <S%G154>ask,<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> that we <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G155>petitions<s%> that we <S%G154>desired<s%> of him.

<S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G1492>see<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G264>sin<s%> a <S%G266>sin<s%> which is not to <S%G2288>death,<s%> he shall <S%G154>ask,<s%> and he shall <S%G1325>give<s%> him <S%G2222>life<s%> for them that <S%G264>sin<s%> not to <S%G2288>death.<s%> There is a <S%G266>sin<s%> to <S%G2288>death:<s%> I do not <S%G3004>say<s%> that he shall <S%G2065>pray<s%> for it.
<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> is <S%G266>sin:<s%> and there is a <S%G266>sin<s%> not to <S%G2288>death.<s%>

We <S%G1492>know<s%> that <S%G3956>whoever<s%> <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G1080>born<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G264>sins<s%> not; but he that is <S%G1080>begotten<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5083>keeps<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and that <S%G4190>wicked<s%> one <S%G680>touches<s%> him not.
And we <S%G1492>know<s%> that we are of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2749>lies<s%> in <S%G4190>wickedness.<s%>

And we <S%G1492>know<s%> that the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2240>come,<s%> and has <S%G1325>given<s%> us an <S%G1271>understanding,<s%> that we may <S%G1097>know<s%> him that is <S%G228>true,<s%> and we are in him that is <S%G228>true,<s%> even in his <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> is the <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>
<S%G5040>Little<s%> <S%G5040>children,<s%> <S%G5442>keep<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> from <S%G1497>idols.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
